Key Match Events: Royce Lewis recorded only his second multihit game since Aug. 12, hitting a three-run double in the fourth inning.
Pre-Game Insights: With Carlos Correa also appearing to be on the cusp of returning soon after that, this is where the Twins really build their momentum for the stretch run.
Manager Rocco Baldelli announced after the victory that the center fielder Byron Buxton will return to the Twins’ roster for Friday’s series opener against the Reds.
Post-Match Reflections: It’s a good time to be getting one of the club’s big boppers back, likely soon followed by the other, with the lineup starting to snap out of its collective funk.
There’s going to be urgency all the way through this and we have to win, Baldelli said.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Griffin Jax pitched in front of his entire family hours after his twin brothers and sister-in-law had participated in the pregame flyover and ceremonial first pitch.
